Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8006 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8006 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpcap is earlier than 1.10.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-8006
